DOC.brief_summary: The chronic success rate, defined as freedom from any atrial tachyarrhythmias will increase from 35% to 60% by ablation of complex fragmented atrial electrograms potentials in addition to pulmonary vein isolation (PVI) as compared to PVI alone in patients with long-standing persistent AF.
DOC.brief_title: Long-Standing Persistant Atrial Fibrillation-Pulmonary Vein Isolation With or Without Ablation
DOC.criteria: long standing persistent atrial fibrillation > 6 months and < 5 years renal failure left atrial size >55 mm
